categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Reodan Qan was a male Human Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. Wielding two lightsabers in combat, he was one of the commanders of the Republic forces on the planet Alderaan.

Master Reodan Qan was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Digital Expansion Star Wars: The Old Republic: Galactic Strongholds, which added Conquest Commanders to most of the dual-faction worlds. Qan is a rare NPC enemy, and his place at the House Traders' Circle on Alderaan is frequently occupied by a generic Veteran Jedi Battlemaster.
